page.title: 09EDUCATION 2
page.content: Between Abbotsham and Bideford stands GRENVILLE COLLEGE-an independent Woodard Foundation School,established 30 years ago. It caters for 346 boys,nearly all borders. Many come from overseas and there is a special unit for the treatment of children suffering from dyslexia. This unit has a high reputation and is recommended by the London Teaching Hospitals. The main school building was formerly Moreton House, home for many generations of the Studley family. The grounds extend to 58 acres, most of which is used as playing- fields. These adjoin the playing- fields of Bideford Comprehensive Scool.
